data.title: Season 2
data.meta_description: The 2nd season of Crayon Shin-chan was aired in the year 1993 in Japan and consists out of 46 episodes and 4 specials. Throughout the season two opening and ending songs are used of which the first were introduced in the second half of the first season. The list below is incomplete.
